subtitle: Kids and adults love these. Serve as a starter or as a main course with oven-cooked chips or potatoes.

method.text: Preheat oven to 190°C. Line a baking tray with foil.
Mix together the breadcrumbs, peanut butter and black pepper in a food processor or blender.
Dip the chicken strips in the egg and then into the breadcrumb mixture, making sure each piece is well covered.
Put the chicken pieces on the baking tray, well spread out. Place in the oven for 15-20 min or until the coating is golden brown and the chicken is cooked through.
Mix together the yogurt and mayonnaise. Stir in the seasoning and chives. Place in a serving dish. Sprinkle with paprika. Serve the goujons immediately with the skinny dip.

title: Crunchy chicken peanut goujons with skinny dip
